title: Wow!
content: Haha, awesome!  When I'm at home later today, I'm all over this.  Hope Flaose gets to see it, wherever he is...

title: WOAH!
content:
Woo! 5th attempt at replying!

There's no emotikeen for this... like, wow... the legend itself... and even a level editor! Craziness.

Heheh... I found a clipping bug... if you somehow change direction while falling against an obstacle, you can get stuck inside the tile.Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

"You are so afraid to live--so afraid of life itself--that you've given up the very nature of your being in trade for security."
-CWG Book 3, Neale Donald Walsh

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

title: Re: WOAH!

title: Re: WOAH!
content:
A warp cheat, neat.

Whoaly.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-drool.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img] This is so much Keen1-3engineish.
Notice there is two levels. You can access the other by changing the name of the level.

Woah, the Future is here! (Or Past..) [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: WOAH!
content:
Actually it's more Slordax-ish or Catacomb II-ish; both use the same key combination to access the warp cheat and they both were made before DDICI, I think.Groeten van Frenkel

title: Re: WOAH!
content:
hey, that is cool! I woneder if anyone talented could put the whole game into that engine. Then again, I could probably just find some ROMs of Mario 3, but every time I look for such things porn pops up everywhere but no games.

And it doesnt matter if Id rereleased Keen6. That is easy to find for download, and there is little risk of dirty popups.*** --- I Am Keen is hell bent for leather. Are you? --- ***

title: Re: WOAH!
content: Change the other level's name to level01.dd2 (before first changing the original level01.dd2's name to some other).You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: WOAH!
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]rerelease Keen 6[hr][/quote]

Say what now??

OMG This is historic, amazing, dichromic! I never thought I'd see this, ever! OMG heart attack!

Interestingly, the scores file uses a simalar, but more simple system as Keen1-3, the level setup is almost identical too, it would theoretically be possible to build a Keen editor to fiddle with them. The sounds can be edited with a slightly modifed version of Spleens Keen 1 editing program, and the EGA file is roughly a paralell to Keens.A proud member of the signature stealing society


[img]http://cheston.com/pbf/PBF042BCPyroBilly.jpg[/img]

"No one should be here.
" -Level Lord

title: Re: Dangerous Dave in "Copyright Infringement"
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Who wants to release DDICI levels or try to mod it?[hr][/quote]

We already have a DDICI mod, fully editable [Its Keen] I can destroy the main menu and other extra stuff if you want, and we can edit the sounds.

[quote]Quote:[hr]But if I try to warp to level 2, the GAME OVER screnn appears![hr][/quote]

You can only play 1 level at a time. Try renaming the level as level 1.

Edit: You can record demos by pushing F7+D [start] and F8 + D [Finnish] I love hexeditors!A proud member of the signature stealing society
